Title: To Steal an Ant-Man
Writer: Brandon Auman, Christopher Yost (story), Joshua Fine (story)
Actors: Christopher B. Duncan, Loren Lester, Colleen O'Shaughnessey, Crispin Freeman
Plot: When Henry Pym discovers that his Ant-Man equipment has been stolen and being used by a criminal, he hires Heroes for Hire to recover it.
